_header: O Queen of bliss thy son Jesu
Subjects: Virgin Mary, carols to; carols, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — ten quatrains (abab) with alternating refrains, ‘Regina celi letare’ and ‘Quem meruisti portare’, and 2-line burden (bb): ‘Stella celi micaris clare / Regina celi letare’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O quene of blisse thy son IhesusQuem meruisti
                    portare…
CULEe112.Last Lines: …So that we may in heven dwellRegina celi letare
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 280-1.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 150; 1977, 133.
